attributes.action: Save The Haven Project.Specialist Care For People With Personality Disorder
attributes.additional_details:
The Haven Project, in Colchester is a unique service dedicated to improving the lives of people, who have the diagnosis of Personality Disorder, and their families. In our 10 years we have reduced inpatient admission to psychiatric hospitals by 85%, saved millions of pounds of NHS money, and now we are facing a funding crisis!

 We would like to appeal to our Commissioners to continue to support and develop our service to help our clients sustain emotional wellbeing, and resilience. We promote a 'life worth living' ethos, with emphasis on the journey of recovery, and towards social contribution.
